FrontDoor

Contains logic used for controlling the machine front door

Functions
Unlock
call FrontDoor.Unlock()

Command the front door to unlock

Lock
call FrontDoor.Lock()

Command the frunt door to lock

IsDoorLockedAndClosed
call FrontDoor.IsDoorLockedAndClosed(
&closedAndLocked
)

Query the status of the front door

Response Parameters
&closedAndLocked

TRUE if the door is closed and locked, otherwise FALSE
